definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
amused by even the weakest joke/ready to laugh at the smallest thing

sentences.english: HHP is a popular online abbreviation for "haha point".
sentences.chinese: HHP是網絡流行用語，表示“笑點”的意思。

sentences.english: Yes, silence adds power to the punchline because it heightens the tension.
sentences.chinese: 是的，沉默爲笑點增強效果，因爲它加深了緊張感。

sentences.english: The pause plays another important role when used just before the punchline.
sentences.chinese: 在笑點之前使用停頓還有作用。

sentences.english: The forehead, maxim robbed many scenes, mainly the punchline? In him.
sentences.chinese: 額，馬克西姆搶了很多戲呢，主要笑點都在他身上。

sentences.english: He talked for 10 minutes and told only one knee-slapper during all that time.
sentences.chinese: 他講了10分鐘，笑點只有一處。

sentences.english: The pause plays another important role when used just before the punchline.
sentences.chinese: 在笑點之前使用停頓還有一個作用。

sentences.english: The well-placed and timed pause will help ensure that the audience hears the punchline.
sentences.chinese: 正確位置和正確時間的停頓幫助觀衆捕捉到笑點。

sentences.english: Rush toward Chi, rush toward Chi, have already smiled to array low dark Wei to mingle boy yet and smile last.
sentences.chinese: 撲哧，撲哧，已經有笑點低的暗衛混小子又笑上了。

sentences.english: And sometimes, even after explanation, I just don't find it funny.
sentences.chinese: 而且有時他解釋過了我也找不到笑點。

sentences.english: That's not because it's not funny. It's because I am probably a little too dumb to get it.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我可能確實太笨了而根本領會不了笑點。

sentences.english: Even then, the magical pause can strengthen the punchline.
sentences.chinese: 即使，有魔力的停頓依然可以笑點。

definition: unable to make sense of what one is hearing
to have guts/to have courage/to be brave
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
